name: UNION EUROPEENNE DES MEDECINS SPECIALISTES - PHYSICAL AND REHABILITATION MEDICINE
membership: European Society of Physical and Rehabilitation Medicine: www.esprm.net
goal: Harmonization of training and education in EU States. Defining the field of competence of our specialty and promote it in all EU States. Defining standards and accrediting programmes of clinical care.
interests: Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Public Health, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
UEMS Statutes and Rules of Procedures
UEMS-PRM Rules of Procedures
Directive 2005.36.EU on the recognition of professional qualifications.
